Sleep Funcions
Stratify OS » POSIX » Unix Standard (unistd)
Collaboration diagram for Sleep Funcions:

Detailed Description

Functions

unsigned int sleep (unsigned int seconds)
 
int usleep (useconds_t useconds)
 

Function Documentation

unsigned int sleep ( unsigned int  seconds)

This function causes the calling thread to sleep for seconds seconds.

Returns
0
Parameters
secondsThe number of seconds to sleep
int usleep ( useconds_t  useconds)

This function causes the calling thread to sleep for useconds microseconds.

Returns
0 or -1 for an error with errno (see Error Numbers) set to:
  • EINVAL: useconds is greater than 1 million.
